document.full_text: the new u.s. consumer financial products agency is testing out slimmer and clearer mortgage disclosure forms, to make borrowers aware if loan payments may skyrocket and to give them greater power to shop around for home loans.
document.title: consumer agency tests simpler mortgage forms
lines_and_colors: the new u.s. consumer financial products agency is testing out slimmer and clearer mortgage disclosure forms, to make borrowers aware if loan payments may skyrocket and to give them greater power to shop around for home loans.
